event DealCancelled(uint256 indexed dealId, uint256 indexed organizationId, address indexed counterParty)
event DealCompleted(uint256 indexed dealId, uint256 indexed organizationId, address indexed counterParty, uint256[] nftIds, uint256[] tokenIds, address[] royaltyReceivers)

event DealCreated(tuple(uint256 id, uint256 orgId, uint256 oneOffPayment, uint256 noOfNFTs, address counterParty, address orgRoyaltyReceiver, bool done, bool cancelled) deal, tuple(uint256 id, uint256 dealId, string nftCID, uint96 royaltyBasisPoints, uint96 orgRoyaltyBasisPoints, address royaltySplitter, uint256 tokenId, bool created)[] nfts)
event RoleAdminChanged(bytes32 indexed role, bytes32 indexed previousAdminRole, bytes32 indexed newAdminRole)
event RoleGranted(bytes32 indexed role, address indexed account, address indexed sender)
event RoleRevoked(bytes32 indexed role, address indexed account, address indexed sender)

function createDeal(uint256 orgId, uint256 amount, uint96 royaltyBasisPoints, uint96 orgRoyaltyBasisPoints, address counterParty, address orgRoyaltyReceiver, string nftCID, uint256 nonce, bytes signature) payable @29000000
function deals(uint256) view returns (uint256 id, uint256 orgId, uint256 oneOffPayment, uint256 noOfNFTs, address counterParty, address orgRoyaltyReceiver, bool done, bool cancelled) @29000000
function hasRole(bytes32 role, address account) view returns (bool) @29000000

function nfts(uint256) view returns (uint256 id, uint256 dealId, string nftCID, uint96 royaltyBasisPoints, uint96 orgRoyaltyBasisPoints, address royaltySplitter, uint256 tokenId, bool created) @29000000
